function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Closure of parks not enforced","Impact":"Failure to control spread of virus and provide park benefits","Mitigation":"Enforce closure of parks and seek alternative safe access options","Technologies":"Enforcement measures, surveillance technology for crowd monitoring","People":"Public visiting the parks","Owner":"Municipal government"},{"Description":"Lack of personnel to enforce safety protocols","Impact":"Inability to open parks safely","Mitigation":"Hire additional personnel, utilize technology for crowd management","Technologies":"Personnel management systems, crowd monitoring and management technology","People":"Municipal government, park staff","Owner":"Municipal government"},{"Description":"Desire to open parks without adequate safety measures","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread","Mitigation":"Implement stringent safety protocols, seek guidance from successful experiences in other places","Technologies":"Safety protocol guidelines, information sharing platforms","People":"Municipal government, park management","Owner":"Municipal government"}]}
